Main-Project.title: Our projects
Main-Project.project-d1: Tourmad is a website created to develop domestic tourism in Uzbekistan. It combines the following services: hotels, restaurants, guides, drivers and other services. The user can view prices and services for places and place an order.
Main-Project.project-d2: Prorun.uz is a website created for running competitions. Users can register and participate in any competition with a simple registration. A convenient registration system has been created for foreigners and other participants.
Main-Project.project-d3: Here, more information should be provided. The Lorem Ipsum text can be replaced with the original project details.

Main-Service.title: Service types
Main-Service.desc: The most popular types of services in the programming field are:
Main-Service.service-d1: Short, impactful, and targeted pages designed to encourage customers to take a specific action.
Main-Service.service-d2: Providing general information about the company, providing information about services or products.
Main-Service.service-d3: Sell ​​products or services online. Payment systems and product management system available.
Main-Service.service-d4: Automate and manage customer engagement. Large companies or organizations that actively work with customers.
Main-Service.service-d5: Showcase personal or company work. For freelancers or creatives promoting their work.
Main-Service.service-d6: To share your thoughts, news, or information. To inform, engage, and advertise.
Main-Service.service-d7: For educational courses, video tutorials or online tests. For educational institutions or companies providing online lessons.
Main-Service.service-d8: An ERP platform is a comprehensive software that integrates all the processes of an enterprise or organization.
Main-Service.service-d9: We help develop new startup projects. We take them from idea to implementation.

Service-Landing.title: Landing pages
Service-Landing.min-desc1: It provides important information that interests the customer at first glance and encourages them to take the next step.
Service-Landing.min-desc2: It is focused on a specific goal and serves to motivate the customer to take a specific action.
Service-Landing.min-desc3: It loads as quickly as possible to avoid affecting customer patience.
Service-Landing.service-p3: (each page will consist of a minimum of 5 sections.)

Service-Catalog.title: Catalog pages
Service-Catalog.min-desc1: Each product is provided with a detailed description, features, benefits, and images.
Service-Catalog.min-desc2: Various filters and sorting options are provided to make customer searches easier.
Service-Catalog.min-desc3: A convenient navigation system has been created for easy and intuitive navigation through the catalog.
Service-Catalog.service-p3: (each page will consist of a minimum of 5 sections.)

Service-Ecom.title: eCommerce Pages
Service-Ecom.min-desc1: Allows customers to purchase goods directly online.
Service-Ecom.min-desc2: Supports a variety of secure payment methods.
Service-Ecom.min-desc3: Provides customers with a fast and convenient delivery service for orders
Service-Ecom.service-p3: (each page will consist of a minimum of 5 sections.)

Service-CRM.title: CRM Pages
Service-CRM.min-desc1: Designed to collect and store important information about customers.
Service-CRM.min-desc2: Allows you to effectively communicate with customers and support them.
Service-CRM.min-desc3: It helps analyze data collected about customers and make decisions.

Service-ERP.title: ERP pages
Service-ERP.min-desc1: It integrates different departments and optimizes information exchange.
Service-ERP.min-desc2: It automates many processes, saving time and resources.
Service-ERP.min-desc3: Allows you to analyze company activities and receive important notifications.
